attributes.action: Enforce current mobility scooter regulations ensuring that all vehicles are registered and carry a licence plate making them traceable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 23rd December, my mum Margaret Quarrell was knocked down and suffered horrific injuries (broken hip, knee, leg and ankle).  The rider of the scooter, got back on his machine and drove off, he has never been traced.  Mum passed away on 27th May, 2 days before her birthday, having never left hospital, or fully recovered from her injuries.  On the very day we should have been celebrating her birthday, we were arranging her funeral.
